name: Night of the Blood Ghosts
description:
This game was made for the Miz Jam. The challenge was to make a game with Kenney's 1-Bit Pack in 48 hours. 

The art pack:

https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

If your antivirus program is either AVG or Avast the Windows version may be detected as a virus. This is a false positive.
